seo: VMware, vCenter, 漏洞检测, CVE-2021-22005, 文件上传
seo_en: VMware, vCenter, vulnerability detection, CVE-2021-22005, file upload
summary: 该插件用于检测 VMware vCenter Server 的 CVE-2021-22005 任意文件上传漏洞，通过发送特定请求验证是否存在该漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the CVE-2021-22005 arbitrary file upload vulnerability in VMware vCenter Server by sending specific requests to verify if the vulnerability exists.
